title: For Sale:  Lot of 3 or more Smith & Wesson SW99 Factory 10 Shot Magazines Walther 99QA 990 Desert Eagle Fast Action 9mm $29 per on 3 or more
location: TN 90 mi East of Memphis, Memphis, Tennessee
postcontent:
Our # XM26489

This listing is for THREE magazines. Hit Buy It Once, and you’re buying 3, not 1. Hit Buy It 3 times and you’re buying 9, and so on. Winning buyers may take any number of extras we have on hand at the same per-mag price and with no additional shipping charges. Here are 10 shot factory Smith & Wesson  Magazines to fit the service size 99 series pistols, both the SW99 and the Walther 99s. These are, of course, the same magazine for the currently marketed Magnum Research MR Eagle Fast Action 915 pistols as well. These magazines Will Not Fit a Smith & Wesson MP9; Will Not Fit a Walther 88; Will Not fit a Model 59; will not fit the handle of an Ames Plumb 1977 ditch bank joe blade. They will only fit SW99, Walther 99 / 990, 990L, and Magnum Research MR Eagle Fast Action 915 full size service pistols chambered in 9mm caliber. These will fit the compact variants of those models but will protrude from the grip frame. These magazines were manufactured by Mec Gar for Smith & Wesson very recently, until S&W and Walther began their separation in late 2012. All of these are new condition never loaded or fired; and they bear the Smith & Wesson factory logo on their left body sides, and the words Made In Italy on the front side. Construction is entirely bright blue steel body and steel spring, with white polymer cartridge followers and black polymer S&W logo marked floorplates. Each magazine holds 10 rounds of 9mm Luger, 9mm Parabellum, 9x19, call it what you will, THE 9mm. That is 5 fewer rounds than the current production Magnum Research MAGFA915 magazines, which we frequently stock also, just not as cheap as these are. These shipped in bulk, and are attractively repackaged. Replacement pricing on these magazines is often $50 apiece or even more in many areas. Our single mag price is $29 per. We’re offering them on a very limited basis, However, in lots of 3 or more at only $19 each. Own 3		for only	$ 57.00. 	
Not for sale to residents of New York City. Any magazine deliveries into New York City require written permission from the Police Commissioner, so we cannot ship magazines into any of the six boroughs or 176 some odd zip codes, per NYC Code 10-131.10. 	


Grips, Magazines, slings, holsters, scopes, mounts, parts & most any small light items,  entire accessory orders only $10.00 total shipping no matter how many a person buys. $10.00 for an entire order, Not $10.00 per item or anything of the sort. $20 Flat Fee on magazine orders to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico, and gun parts to PR civilians must ship to an FFL. Magazines and any small light non-gun items ride free with ammo orders. We accept checks with no more than 7 days hold. GA Pay, MC, Visa, Discover phone- or fax-in 7 3 1 9 8 9 4 7 2 3 orders, USPS Money Order items shipped ASAP please put your full information, venue number, and what the item is on any messages. Internet phone hours 8:30 – 4:30 CST Mon – Fri. Robertson Trading Post 117 Front Street PO Box 365 Henderson, Tennessee 38340. 	We buy, sell, and trade. Always have, since 1952.

title: For Sale:  M1 Garand - Shuff's Mini G custom Garand
location: S of Wilburton, OK, Oklahoma, United States
postcontent:
Here is a Shuff’s Mini G custom conversion by Tim Shufflin of Shuff’s Parkerizing.
 I purchased this from GunsmithTim Shufflin of Shuff’s Parkerizing in September 2011.  It is a Springfield Garand that has had the barrel shortened to 16” with a redesigned op rod and Schuster adjustable gas plug.  Full length is now 35”.  This is NOT a tanker garand (note there is NO foregrip remaining). Shuff can only do a few of these each year for tax purposes, and his waiting list now goes into 2015. Full info at can be found at http://www.shuffsparkerizing.com . It has had about 150 rounds fired through it, a mix of Greek surplus and Soft nose 150 gr. hunting rounds.  It is accurate and in excellent condition.  It comes with an installed Holbrook Device ( http://www.m1thumbsaver.com $65.00) which replaces the op rod catch and keeps the enbloc from ejecting until you push the eject button for allowing use of an inline scope, CASM scope mount (http://www.m14.ca/M1_GARAND_CASM_Scope%20Mount.html  $179.95), Smith muzzle brake @ $150.00) and will come with the original complete rear sight aperture assembly and op rod catch (that was replaced by the Holbrook device).  Also included will be butt stock cleaning kit with grease tub, sling, one of Shufflin’s Stock mount 2-enbloc mag pouch and 10 enbloc clips only (no ammo).  For an additional 100 dollars I will include the Leaper’s UTG 4-16 x 50 mil dot scope with illuminated reticule. (http://www.leapers.com/prod_detail.php?mitem=optic&itemno=SCP-416AOMDLTS).
Price is $1700 w/o scope, $1800 with scope.  Prefer FTF but will ship for $45.00 to your FFL.

title: For Sale:  BCM 14.5 LW MID AR15 with case, mags and ammo LIKE NEW
postcontent:
Offered for sale is a BCM AR15 in 556/223.  This is not a “franken-gun” put together by a home gunsmith.  This carbine was built by Bravo Company USA, and purchased by me brand new.  I have not taken it apart beyond normal field strip or done any modifications to it.  Like all BCM rifles, this one is “mil spec”, and all details can be found on the Bravo Company USA website.  If you have any questions, feel free to ask me.

It has less than 250 rounds fired through it.  I bought it a year ago, and because of ammo prices I never shoot it.  I reload for other calibers so I can shoot my .308’s cheaper than this rifle so I end up never using it.  I am using the money from this sale to purchase a Colt 9mm SMG.  I am keeping the sling, sights, and optics off this rifle to put on my new one.  So this rifle will not have any sights or optics or a sling.

The combination of lightweight 14.5 barrel, mid length gas system, and Surefire MB556K compensator make this carbine one of the most fun guns to shoot I have ever owned.  Very smooth, low recoiling gun with almost no muzzle rise make for extremely fast shot recovery and the long rail really helps you “drive” the muzzle.  

It looks like a brand new gun.  There is no damage or blemishes.  You will not be disappointed in the condition.

It comes with:

5 Magpul 30 round P-Mags
250 Rounds of 556
Plano waterproof, hard shell, lockable case.

Specifications:  

BCM 14.5 inch light weight profile barrel 1/7 twist 556 / 223. 
Surefire MB556K pinned muzzle device (legal 16” barrel length, no SBR required)
Troy  VTAC Alpha Rail 13” length
Toy VTAC Alpha top rail mounted QD sling mount
BCM 7076 forged lower with BCM tool steel trigger group.
BCM “gunfighter” MOD 0 grip
BCM 6 position receiver extension.
Magpul CTR adjustable locking stock.
BCM 7076 forged upper with T marks.
BCM bolt carrier group 
BCM “gunfighter” charging handle mod 4 (medium latch)

Any questions about this gun just ask.  Cash only, must be a sane adult Nevada resident and not a weirdo. If it is illegal for you to own this, do not contact me.

Our # XM5915B

Restrictions apply on higher capacity magazines in many jurisdictions, so please read this entire ad carefully before bidding or offering to buy. This listing is for THREE magazines, hit Buy It and you’re buying 3, not 1. Winning buyer can take any number of extras we have available at the same per-mag price and no additional shipping charges. For reliable performance, there are only two names in magazines for 5900 series Smith & Wesson Pistols. One is Check-Mate, S&W’s own proprietary contractor. The other name is Mec-Gar. Mec Gar magazines ensure reliable functioning of semi-auto handguns in all manner of conditions, and they are the primary supplier for no less notables than Browning, Beretta, Sig Arms, and Smith & Wesson. Mec Gar magazines lock the slide back like they’re supposed to, and free-fall eject like they’re supposed to, every time. Here is Mec-Gar’s 15 round magazine for any Smith & Wesson 59 or 5900 type pistol, including models 59, 59-1, 659, 459, 669, 910, 915, 5903, 5906, 5946, 6906, and 6946. These magazines will also work very well in the Marlin Camp 9 Rifles, in Kel-Tec P11 pistols or SU-2000 rifles designed for Smith & Wesson magazines; and even in Star pistols models 28 and 30 but only Stars with their magazine safeties removed. The Smith & Wesson 459 and Star 30 in some of our photos are not included, and we are not advertising them for sale. These are solid blue steel bodied magazines with hard polymer black cartridge followers and extended spacer floorplate that ensures compliance in jurisdictions where standard magazines are restricted to Law Enforcement. Each magazine holds 15 rounds of 9mm caliber ammunition. Replacement pricing on factory S&W 5900 series magazines is upwards of $60 apiece. Our single magazine price on these Mec-Gars is $39 each. We’re offering the Mec Gar 10 round magazines, the Ones in the photo or their identical mates in lots of 3 or more at only $29 each. Own 3 $ 87.00. The Webley Revolver (also known as the Webley Break-Top Revolver or Webley Self-Extracting Revolver) was, in various marks, the standard issue service pistol for the armed forces of the United Kingdom, the British Empire, and the Commonwealth from 1887 until 1963.

The Webley is a top-break revolver with automatic extraction. That is, breaking the revolver open for reloading also operates the extractor. This removes the spent cartridges from the cylinder. The Webley Mk I service revolver was adopted in 1887. A later version, the Mk IV, rose to prominence during the Boer War of 1899–1902. However, the Mk VI, introduced in 1915 during the First World War, is perhaps the best-known model.

Firing the large .455 Webley cartridge, Webley service revolvers are among the most powerful top-break revolvers ever produced. Although the .455 calibre Webley is no longer in military service, the .38/200 Webley Mk IV variant is still in use as a police sidearm in a number of countries

title: For Sale:  Surfire Helmet Light Tan
postcontent:
CREDIT / DEBIT ACCEPTED.


This compact, multiple-output Helmet Light features three white LEDs, two blue LEDs, and one blinking infrared LED that serves as a personal Identify Friend or Foe (IFF) beacon. The white primary LEDs are perfect for general-purpose, close-work illumination; the blue secondary LEDs serve the same purpose in a low-signature, night-vision-friendly color. 

The Helmet Light features a durable, watertight polymer body that comes in both tan and black. It attaches via a special mount that clamps semi-permanently to the rim of any Modular Integrated Communications Helmet (MICH) by means of two socket-head machine screws. Once the mount is attached, the light can be easily slid onto the mount, where it locks in place; depressing a small lever slides it right off, so the Helmet Light can be quickly removed for servicing or transport onto its optional Z71 carry clip, which attaches to any MOLLE or ALICE vest.

Made of durable glass-filled nylon polymer and neoprene

title: For Sale:  Ithaca M66 SuperSingle
postcontent:
Mid- to late-'70s vintage Ithaca M66 SuperSingle with a full choke 32-inch "Long Tom" barrel.  This lever action break open shotgun has been in my family since new and is in surprisingly good shape with only a a handful of small blemishes, especially considering its primary use as a goose gun in the late '70s & early '80s.  The gun has shot less than 100 rounds in the last 25 years, but as I verified in a recent trip to the range, it still works great.  

These single shots are especially versatile and well suited for using shotgun adapters in a host of calibers ranging from .22LR on up to magnum handguns and even certain rifle calibers like .223 or  7.62 x 39.

title: For Sale:  PWS Primary Weapons Systems MK118 18" .223 Rifle
postcontent:
Part Number: PWS-M118RA1B

 In the style of a true Designated Marksman Rifle, the PWS MK118 is a favorite in the precision rifle community. The MK118 is designed as a DMR and retains lethal capability out to 600 meters with varying types of ammunition and boasts a PWS FSC556.

Utilizing the proven system originally designed for the MK107, the MK118 uses a mid length gas piston system. The operating system, designed after the venerable AK-47, features a long stroke fixed operating rod design with an adjustable gas block, 15 handguard and free-floated barrel.

The handguard features the VLTOR KeyMod System which comes standard with two 2 sections of 1913 rail as well as a continuous 1913 top rail.

Understanding the importance of an ultra-reliable package that is light as possible, mil-spec forgings are used for the upper and lower receiver. Additional features include the BCM GUNFIGHTER charging handle, the PWS enhanced buffer tube and an ALG Defense QMS trigger. The rifle is rounded out with industry leading features such as Magpul MOE grip, MOE stock, and MBUS2 sights.

title: For Sale:  Beretta 92FS M9 Factory Firing Pin Lever or FP Block Release Lever any 92 series 92SB, 92SBF, 92F, 92FS, 92A1, M9, 90-Two, Vertec, Brigadier, Elite, 96
location: TN 90 mi East of Memphis, Memphis, Tennessee
postcontent:
Our # C55535

This listing is for One Factory Beretta Firing Pin Catch Lever, or firing pin block lever. Buyers, however, may take any number of extra levers we have on hand at the same per-lever price and with no additional shipping charges. From an old Southern Warehouse comes these new and unissued factory Beretta Firing Pin Catch Levers, an important internal part on Series 90, 92, and 96 Beretta Pistols. This is the part that disengages the firing pin safety when the operator pulls the trigger. Beretta part number is C55535. These levers fit any 90, 92, or 96 series Beretta Pistol chambered in 9mm or .40 S&W caliber, including 92, 92SB, 92SBF, 92F, 92FS, 92A1, M9, 90-Two, 96, Vertec, Brigadier, and Elite. Manufacturer is Beretta USA of Accokeek Maryland. Construction is heat treated steel. These are best installed by a competent armorer or gunsmith, and we are neither. All of these parts are new and unissued. We have not detected any contact wear or shelf wear on any of our specimens. The Black Ice Teflon 92FS slide in some of our photos is not included, of course. Replacement pricing often approaches $35 for this part. We’re offering the Factory Beretta Firing Pin Catch Levers or Block Levers in the photos, or their identical mates from the same batch, each for only $ 15.00. 

Grips, Magazines, slings, holsters, scopes, mounts, parts & most any small light items, entire accessory orders only $10.00 total shipping no matter how many a person buys. $10.00 for an entire order, Not $10.00 per item or anything of the sort. $20 Flat Fee on magazine orders to Alaska, Hawaii, or Puerto Rico, and gun parts to PR civilians must ship to an FFL. Magazines and any small light non-gun items ride free with ammo orders. We accept checks with no more than 7 days hold. GA Pay, MC, Visa, Discover phone- or fax-in 7 3 1 9 8 9 4 7 2 3 orders, USPS Money Order items shipped ASAP please put your full information, venue number, and what the item is on any messages. Internet phone hours 8:00 – 5:00 CST Mon – Fri. Robertson Trading Post 117 Front Street PO Box 365 Henderson, Tennessee 38340. We buy, sell, and trade. Always have, since 1952.

title: For Sale/Trade:  S&W BG38 BodyGuard 38 Special +P - Perfect CCW Revolver - Nice!
postcontent:
I’m selling a really nice 38 Special revolver that has only had approximately 35 rounds shot through it.  I would consider trading for a Glock 42 (380), Ruger LCP (380) or a 9mm in Glock, Ruger or Springfield. 

This is a GREAT 38 Special CCW gun with the hammerless design, so it won't snag on clothing, snag on the inside of a purse, a pocket, etc.  It is definitely small enough to carry in your front pocket, with no issues at all!  

This S&W 38 special is a 5 shot revolver that will also take +P ammunition, comes with a 3 mode INSIGHT Laser, has the polymer frame so it’s lightweight and has a 1.875" barrel.  It is a concealed hammer double action pistol with the ambidextrous cylinder release on the top, which makes for a perfect design when you consider a pistol that you will carry a lot!   

The Smith & Wesson BODYGUARD® series is the first in personal protection with integrated lasers. The BODYGUARD® 38 is uniquely engineered as the most state-of-the-art, concealable and accurate personal protection possible. Lightweight, simple to use and featuring integrated laser sights – nothing protects like a BODYGUARD.   

Smith & Wesson BODYGUARD personal protection handguns are designed and engineered specifically to include the latest in laser sighting technology for optimal accuracy. INSIGHT® is a world leader in the design, development and manufacture of tactical lasers.  The Integrated INSIGHT® laser has a push-button operation, which is ambidextrous and top-mounted.  The laser has 3 Modes which include a Constant-On, Pulse and Off, plus it includes a 5 minute auto-off timer!  The battery life is 3 hours if on continuously and it has adjustable windage and elevation, with no disassembly required!

Here are the revolver specific specifications:  

Make: Smith & Wesson
Model: BODYGUARD® 38
Caliber: .38 S&W Special +P
Capacity: 5 Rounds
Barrel Length: 1.9" / 4.8 cm
Action: Double Action Only
Front Sight: Black Ramp
Rear Sight: Integral
Frame Size: Small - Internal Hammer
Grip: Synthetic
Overall Length: 6.6" / 16.8 cm
Weight: 14.3 oz / 405.4 g
Upper Frame Material: Aluminum Alloy
Lower Frame Material: Steel-Reinforced Polymer
Cylinder Material: Stainless Steel with PVD Coating
Purpose: Personal Protection

Again, the size, reliability and polymer frame make it a perfect pocket pistol or CCW pistol!!!

Factory box is included, but no ammo with the deal.  

Asking $450 cash, in person

title: For Sale:   Zastava M70AB2 AK underfolder + PMAGs and accessories, killer package deal. Unfired, new in the box
postcontent:
I bought this thinking I would get into a more "modern" rifle, but I'm just too much a "wood and steel" guy. So I'm bundling this brand spanking new, unfired, still in the box AK underfolder with some top rate goodies!

The rifle is a Yugoslavian M70AB2 underfolder. These are becoming increasingly hard to obtain as Zastava and its importers are moving to the NPAP style rifles which have thinner receivers and may lack features like bayonet lugs and grenade sights. 

This rifle was assembled from a military surplus Yugo AKM part kit on an RPK receiver with a new barrel and was imported by Century. The receivers on the M70AB2s are 50% thicker than normal AK rifle has the distinctive "bulge" at the trunion indicating the reinforced reciever. The Yugoslavian military designed these rifles to be much heavier duty than standard AKs to be able to launch rifle grenades, and it shows. Basically this thing is built like a tank. Heavy receiver, thick gas block, reinforced recoil spring retaining clip, and more. 

It has all the "evil rifle features" - flip up grenade sight, threaded muzzle with classic slant cut brake, and bayonet lug. It also features flip up night sights. Add a few dabs of phosphorescent paint and you're all set to shoot in low light conditions. The quality on these builds is exceptional, with tight fit and finish, very solid polymer furniture, and a durable and even parkerization on the metal parts. And of course the paratrooper style folding stock! 

Included with the rifle is a full milsurp accessory kit, including an original issue Yugo 30 round magazine still in cosmoline with the bolt hold open follower, oiler bottle, old school Yugo boresnake, sling, cleaning rod, and cleaning kit. I am also including a brand new pro-mag 30 round magazine and 4 band new Magpul PMAG AK magazines all with their original packaging. The Magpul magazines are especially good - head and shoulders above other after market magazines with grip surfaces on the mag to provide a steady hand-hold, special followers to ensure smooth and reliable feeding, and extremely durable construction. 

I am also throwing in two new, unissued surplus Eastern European three cell magazine pouches (ammo and old fashioned steel mags not included  ) to complete your new rig. 

This is registered as a rifle in Michigan. I am asking $725 for the rifle, accessories, magazines, mag pouches, and original box & shipping materials or $680 for everything but the 4 PMAGs. Not interested in trades at this time and I will drive to meet with buyers outside of the Ann Arbor/Saline area. I will also ship the rifle to an FFL for a flat $20 anywhere in Michigan. Face to face buyers must present a valid Michigan driver's license and sign a very simple bill of sale (which just says that you are buying the rifle and agree that you are legally allowed to own this firearm in the state of Michigan)

Thanks and good luck!

title: For Sale/Trade:  STEYR M9 9mm 1ST GEN TRADE FOR...?
postcontent:
styer m9 9mm pistol. original padded case/box and paperwork.  2 clips and take down keys.  trapezoid sights!  in amost mint condition! very well taken care of. THESE ARE HARD TO FIND IN THIS SHAPE!
FEATURES
6 groove rh rifled barrel
TITANIUM guide rod
2  mags
chambered round indicator
ambidextrous safety
special double action (reset action system)
extremely balanced and trigger breaks like glass!
The Steyr’s ergonomics alone were probably enough to sell me on the gun but frankly, what really hooked me was the trigger. Its advertised as a “DAO” trigger, and I guess, technically speaking, it is.  But it reminds me a hell of a lot more of a two-stage AR-15 trigger than a traditional double action pistol trigger. There is about 3/16th of an inch of easy take up followed by a fairly crisp five-pound break. There’s only the slightest amount of creep and minimal over-travel.  The reset is also very short. All in all, this trigger is superior in every way to a Glock

 trade for gun or cash          REDACTED

title: For Sale:  Browning X-Bolt 270 wsm with rings....
postcontent:
PRICED TO SELL TODAY
I have a browning xbolt Was $650 now $550 firm.. This rifle has a low round count and is very accurate. This will come with the rings. Scope not included. Pm or text 3609709514. Thanks Jeff 
The raised cheek piece helps to direct recoil into the shoulder area and quickly puts the shooter's line of sight in alignment with the scope
A satin finish provides protection and enhances the natural beauty of the hardwood.
The high grade Walnut stock with detailed checkering provides classic good looks.
Durable low-luster blued finish reduces reflective glare
Button-rifled barrel is triple checked for quality and individually hand chambered and air gauged to ensure consistency and accuracy.
The target Crown enables the uniform release of gas as the bullet exits the barrel, preventing a shift in trajectory. The Crown is recessed to protect it from accidental damage that degrades accuracy.
Free floated barrel eliminates contact interference from the fore-end, enabling the superior barrel craftsmanship to perform consistently and accurately.
Drilled and tapped for X-Lock scope mounts that use four screws for each base to provide a rock solid optic platform.
Adjustable Feather Trigger minimizes the "human factor" by eliminating creep and take-up — providing a crisp trigger pull that "breaks like glass."
Low profile action allows you to mount the scope extremely close to the center of the bore to minimize the offset between point of aim and Point of Impact.
60° bolt lift keeps the thumb and fingers clear of the scope when cycling the action and allows the bolt to be operated in a smoother/quicker motion.
Top-tang safety offers easy accessibility without removing your firing hand from the stock. The shooter can quickly manipulate the safety, or verify the position of the safety, without losing your sight picture or cheek weld.
Detachable Rotary magazine is built from tough polymer and is designed to stop forward movement of the cartridge by contacting the shoulder of the case rather than the tip of the projectile. This prevents bullet tip deformation and recoil induced bullet seating depth change.
Bolt Unlock Button allows the bolt to be cycled with the safety engaged.
Innovative Inflex Technology recoil pad uses directional deflection to pull the stock down and away from the face to reduce perceived recoil.

The raised cheek piece helps to direct recoil into the shoulder area and quickly puts the shooter's line of sight in alignment with the scope
A satin finish provides protection and enhances the natural beauty of the hardwood.
The high grade Walnut stock with detailed checkering provides classic good looks.
Durable low-luster blued finish reduces reflective glare
Button-rifled barrel is triple checked for quality and individually hand chambered and air gauged to ensure consistency and accuracy.
The target Crown enables the uniform release of gas as the bullet exits the barrel, preventing a shift in trajectory. The Crown is recessed to protect it from accidental damage that degrades accuracy.
Free floated barrel eliminates contact interference from the fore-end, enabling the superior barrel craftsmanship to perform consistently and accurately.
Drilled and tapped for X-Lock scope mounts that use four screws for each base to provide a rock solid optic platform.
Adjustable Feather Trigger minimizes the "human factor" by eliminating creep and take-up — providing a crisp trigger pull that "breaks like glass."
Low profile action allows you to mount the scope extremely close to the center of the bore to minimize the offset between point of aim and Point of Impact.
60° bolt lift keeps the thumb and fingers clear of the scope when cycling the action and allows the bolt to be operated in a smoother/quicker motion.
Top-tang safety offers easy accessibility without removing your firing hand from the stock. The shooter can quickly manipulate the safety, or verify the position of the safety, without losing your sight picture or cheek weld.
Detachable Rotary magazine is built from tough polymer and is designed to stop forward movement of the cartridge by contacting the shoulder of the case rather than the tip of the projectile. This prevents bullet tip deformation and recoil induced bullet seating depth change.
Bolt Unlock Button allows the bolt to be cycled with the safety engaged.
Innovative Inflex Technology recoil pad uses directional deflection to pull the stock down and away from the face to reduce perceived recoil.

title: For Sale:  Heckler & Koch 45 Compact w/2 mags
postcontent:
HK45 Compact

Smaller in length and height than the standard HK45, the HK45 Compact (HK45C) uses a slim-line grip profile, otherwise is nearly identical in features to the full-size HK45.

Like the HK45, the HK45 Compact was developed as a possible candidate for the Joint Combat Pistol (JCP) and Combat Pistol (CP) programs administered by the U.S. military in their search for a new service handgun. These programs were suspended before completion and no pistols were selected.

The HK45 Compact uses an HK proprietary O-ring barrel for precise barrel-to-slide lockup and optimal accuracy. HK45 barrels are made using the famous HK cold-hammer forging process for superior performance.

Using HK’s unique internal mechanical recoil reduction system reduces the recoil forces imparted to the weapon and shooter by as much as 30%, improving shooter control during rapid firing and increasing component service life.

Capable of firing standard .45 ACP ball through +P ammunition, the HK45 Compact has an 8-round magazine capacity but can also use 10-round magazines, including those designed for the full-size HK45. The HK45 combines the accuracy, modularity, reliability, and minimum 20,000 round service life of the renowned USP45 Compact with the improved ergonomics of the P2000 series pistols. HK45 Compacts can be also be fitted with threaded barrels for use with muzzle mounted sound suppressors.

Each HK45 Compact comes standard with an extra backstrap for a custom fit for each shooter’s hand.

Both the HK45 Compact and full-size HK45 use an improved USP-style control lever, a combination safety and decocking lever. The control lever is frame mounted and is quickly accessible; it has a positive stop and returns to the “fire” position after decocking.

By using the modular approach to the internal components first pioneered by HK on the USP, the control lever function of the HK45 and HK45C can be switched from the left to the right side of the pistol to accommodate left-handed shooters (additional parts required). Left and right mounted control levers provide safety and/or decocking functions as required and can be fitted to the pistol simply by changing parts. For true ambidextrous use, a control lever can also be mounted on both sides of the pistol if required.

Well-suited for personal defense use, the HK45C is available in, or can be converted to, a wide variety of variants that use different trigger firing modes, including double action/single action (DA/SA) and DAO (double action only). The DAO mode uses the unique Heckler & Koch LEM (Law Enforcement Modification) firing system, providing an enhanced double action trigger pull.

Extensively tested and operationally proven, the HK45C is currently being assembled from U.S. and German made components at HK’s American manufacturing facility in Newington, New Hampshire.
Key features and system characteristics::

    Integral MIL-STD-1913 (Picatinny) rail molded into the polymer frame dust cover for mounting lights, laser aimers, and other accessories
    ERGO (HK45 full-size) and slim-line (HK45 Compact) grip profiles with user replaceable grip panels to adjust the feel and grip circumference of the weapon to suit individual operator hand size and shooting preference
    8-round metal magazine is standard for the HK45C, common high-capacity (10 rounds) that fit both the HK45 and HK45C also available
    Ambidextrous controls with dual slide releases and enlarged magazine release
    Uses the proven modified Browning linkless recoil operating system
    O-ring barrel for precise barrel-to-slide lockup and better accuracy
    Polygonal rifling for longer barrel life and increased accuracy
    Improved ergonomic control levers (safety and/or decocking)
    Low profile drift adjustable 3-dot sights
    Contoured and radiused slide with forward slide (grasping) grooves and anti-glare longitudinal ribs
    Black polymer frame

title: For Sale:  AR-15
postcontent:
Evening all, 

Bought this rifle a bit ago for a backup to my primary AR as a lightweight carbine, but Ihave decided that I would like to sell it off to fund building an A2 replica. 

It is a PSA premium upper, the specifics on it can be found here, 
http://palmettostatearmory.com/index.php/psa-m4-premium-16-cmv-cl-upper-with-bcg-and-charging-handle.html

The lower is a complete new frontier LW-15.

From my research, the PSA upper sports a 1/7 twist chrome lined FN barrel (4150 mil spec steel) with M4 profile and M4 feed ramps. The BCG is mil spec, properly staked and put together and has been MPI'd etc. 

All this rifle needs is a rear sight like a magpul MBUS rear and it is ready to go. It's light, has a great trigger and is a good deal for anyone looking to get a deal on a quality AR. Once it was put together it had a few rounds run through it to check for function which it did perfectly. 
It has heat shielded M4 handguards but I will also be throwing in carbine length quad rail handgaurds as well and one magazine (has marks on it, I number my mags) and a sling (nothing special, came with my other AR) 




Not really looking for trades unless it's for an AR-15 A2 with a removable carry handle.

title: For Sale:  Heckler & Kock NIB
postcontent:
HK45 Compact

Smaller in length and height than the standard HK45, the HK45 Compact (HK45C) uses a slim-line grip profile, otherwise is nearly identical in features to the full-size HK45.

Like the HK45, the HK45 Compact was developed as a possible candidate for the Joint Combat Pistol (JCP) and Combat Pistol (CP) programs administered by the U.S. military in their search for a new service handgun. These programs were suspended before completion and no pistols were selected.

The HK45 Compact uses an HK proprietary O-ring barrel for precise barrel-to-slide lockup and optimal accuracy. HK45 barrels are made using the famous HK cold-hammer forging process for superior performance.

Using HK’s unique internal mechanical recoil reduction system reduces the recoil forces imparted to the weapon and shooter by as much as 30%, improving shooter control during rapid firing and increasing component service life.

Capable of firing standard .45 ACP ball through +P ammunition, the HK45 Compact has an 8-round magazine capacity but can also use 10-round magazines, including those designed for the full-size HK45. The HK45 combines the accuracy, modularity, reliability, and minimum 20,000 round service life of the renowned USP45 Compact with the improved ergonomics of the P2000 series pistols. HK45 Compacts can be also be fitted with threaded barrels for use with muzzle mounted sound suppressors.

Each HK45 Compact comes standard with an extra backstrap for a custom fit for each shooter’s hand.

Both the HK45 Compact and full-size HK45 use an improved USP-style control lever, a combination safety and decocking lever. The control lever is frame mounted and is quickly accessible; it has a positive stop and returns to the “fire” position after decocking.

By using the modular approach to the internal components first pioneered by HK on the USP, the control lever function of the HK45 and HK45C can be switched from the left to the right side of the pistol to accommodate left-handed shooters (additional parts required). Left and right mounted control levers provide safety and/or decocking functions as required and can be fitted to the pistol simply by changing parts. For true ambidextrous use, a control lever can also be mounted on both sides of the pistol if required.

Well-suited for personal defense use, the HK45C is available in, or can be converted to, a wide variety of variants that use different trigger firing modes, including double action/single action (DA/SA) and DAO (double action only). The DAO mode uses the unique Heckler & Koch LEM (Law Enforcement Modification) firing system, providing an enhanced double action trigger pull.

Extensively tested and operationally proven, the HK45C is currently being assembled from U.S. and German made components at HK’s American manufacturing facility in Newington, New Hampshire.
Key features and system characteristics::

    Integral MIL-STD-1913 (Picatinny) rail molded into the polymer frame dust cover for mounting lights, laser aimers, and other accessories
    ERGO (HK45 full-size) and slim-line (HK45 Compact) grip profiles with user replaceable grip panels to adjust the feel and grip circumference of the weapon to suit individual operator hand size and shooting preference
    8-round metal magazine is standard for the HK45C, common high-capacity (10 rounds) that fit both the HK45 and HK45C also available
    Ambidextrous controls with dual slide releases and enlarged magazine release
    Uses the proven modified Browning linkless recoil operating system
    O-ring barrel for precise barrel-to-slide lockup and better accuracy
    Polygonal rifling for longer barrel life and increased accuracy
    Improved ergonomic control levers (safety and/or decocking)
    Low profile drift adjustable 3-dot sights
    Contoured and radiused slide with forward slide (grasping) grooves and anti-glare longitudinal ribs
    Black polymer frame

title: For Sale:  Zastava CZ67 70 32 Auto Magazine Triple K 8 rd .32 ACP XM526M
location: TN 90 mi East of Memphis, Memphis, Tennessee
postcontent:
Our # XM526M

NO MAGAZINE SALES into NEW YORK CITY Our #XM526M, Magazine for Crvena Zastava Yugoslavian 32 Automatic 8 Shot .32 ACP caliber New Triple K US Made Aftermarket/ This listing is for ONE magazine; winning buyer, however, may take any number of extras we have available at the same per-mag price with no additional shipping charges. Most of us who’ve been in the firearms business for any length of time came to know Triple K Manufacturing through their excellent leather gear. Triple K has been in business since 1946. Of all the manufacturers, Triple K is the only source left for magazines to fit many discontinued firearms. Photos show specimens of the Triple K #526M, their blue steel magazine to fit the Yugoslavian Made Crvena Zastava Model 67 or Model 70 or 67 / 70 Pistols chambered in .32 ACP or 7.65mm Browning Caliber, The 32 Automatic caliber. This magazine will NOT fit a CZ-70 pistol. The Zastava is a single action only Tokarev type pistol, and the very different Czech CZ-70 is a Walther type pistol in double action. Any shoppers who are unclear on whether their CZ 70 is Yugoslavian or Czech should enter Go ogle terms Zastava model 67 70 Pistol Wiki and look at the photos. Construction is all steel body, springs, cartridge follower, and floorplate. This magazine holds 8 rounds of .32 ACP Ammunition. It will not accept .380 or any other caliber. We’re offering these brand new Triple K magazines each for only $ 35.00. Not for sale to residents of New York City. Any magazine deliveries into New York City require written permission from the Police Commissioner, so we cannot ship magazines into any of the six boroughs or 176 some odd zip codes, per NYC Code 10-131.10.
